# bal-navbar

A responsive horizontal navbar that can support images, links, buttons, and dropdowns

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                 | Type      | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `light`  | `light`   | It `true` the navbar has a white background | `boolean` | `false` |
